document_data.name: Ammonia
document_data.mainbody: '''Ammonia''' was a gaseous substance that could be found in the Realms.
document_data.Description: In its gaseous state, ammonia was semi-[[poison]]ous with a terrific smell that would induce tears in those exposed to it.
document_data.Availability:
[[Druid]]s had alchemical techniques for creating gaseous ammonia by breaking down [[coal]].

An ''[[alchemy jug]]'' could be made to produce liquid ammonia.
document_data.Usage:
* As a semi-poisonous gas, ammonia was considered useful for "smoking out" enemies in enclosed spaces.{{Cite dragon/45/Gas 'em up and Smoke 'em Out|6,7}} 
* [[Smelling salts]] were a crystallized form of ammonia used for medical purposes. Exposing an unconscious individual to gaseous ammonia or its salts would wake them to consciousness, even from a ''[[sleep]]'' spell.{{Cite dragon/119/"Is There a Doctor In the Forest?"|19}}
